response.overview: A boy recalls the death of Dandy, a baby deer hit by a car and sets his spirit free through his dream. Dandy's emerging first in the boy's mind and then becomes the boy's self further being projected across the void from within the boy's dream. The spirit of the baby deer is merged with the cosmic field according to the main law of nature of one reflecting in everything and everything being one, unbounded and inseparable.
response.title: Absorbed
